players.name: Elara Moonwhisper
players.wound: Witnessed her kingdom's destruction as a child
players.desire: To unite the fractured realms and prevent another war
players.arc: From revenge-driven warrior to diplomatic peacemaker

players.name: Thorne Ironheart
players.wound: Exiled from his clan for refusing an unjust order
players.desire: To prove honor matters more than blind loyalty

players.name: Lysandra the Wise
players.wound: Her prophecy was ignored, leading to catastrophe
players.arc: From dismissed oracle to trusted advisor

perspectives.name: Vengeance vs Justice
perspectives.description: The line between righteous revenge and true justice
perspectives.thematic_question: Can you seek justice without becoming the monster you fight?

perspectives.name: Power vs Responsibility
perspectives.description: The burden of leadership and the cost of power
perspectives.thematic_question: Does power corrupt, or does it reveal who we truly are?

perspectives.name: Unity vs Division
perspectives.description: The challenge of bringing together those who have been enemies
perspectives.thematic_question: Can ancient enemies truly become allies?

storybeats.title: The Call to Arms
storybeats.description: Elara receives word that the ancient enemy is rising again. She must decide whether to seek revenge or build alliances.

storybeats.title: The Unlikely Alliance
storybeats.description: Elara encounters Thorne, an exiled dwarf. Despite their peoples' historical enmity, they recognize a common cause.

storybeats.title: The Prophecy Revealed
storybeats.description: Lysandra shares a devastating prophecy: unity can only be achieved through great sacrifice. Elara faces the cost of leadership.

storybeats.title: Council of Rivals
storybeats.description: Elara, Thorne, and Lysandra bring together the fractured realms for the first time in centuries. Old wounds threaten to destroy the fragile peace.

storybeats.title: The Choice of Mercy
storybeats.description: Elara captures the enemy commander - the one who destroyed her kingdom. She can choose vengeance or set an example of justice.

moments.description: Face to face with the destroyer

storybeats.title: The Unity Forged
storybeats.description: By choosing justice over vengeance, Elara inspires the realms to truly unite. The crown is not claimed but earned through sacrifice.

storypoints.title: Cost Revealed
storypoints.description: The prophecy shows the price of unity

storypoints.title: Gathering
storypoints.description: All realms meet for the first time
